entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
